dsense.name: way, way of doing [sth], way to do [sth]

example.eg: There is more than one way to make a cup of tea.
example.egtrans: 泡茶不止一种方法。

dsense.name: the way, the way that, the way in which

example.eg: Show me the way you knead dough.
example.egtrans: 请向我展示你揉面的方法。

example.eg: This is the way to do it.
example.egtrans: 这就是解决它的正确的办法。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 首选的办法, 正确的办法

example.eg: The way to accelerate the project is to add staff.
example.egtrans: 加快项目速度的方法就是增加员工。

example.eg: Which way did you go to get here?
example.egtrans: 您是从哪边过来的？

example.eg: We divided the dessert three ways.
example.egtrans: 我们把甜点分成三份。

example.eg: The street I live on is called Artren Way.
example.egtrans: 我住的那条街叫阿特伦路。

example.eg: There is a way through the mountains ten kilometres south of here.
example.egtrans: 从这里往南十公里有条路穿过山岭。

example.eg: I don't know the way to the pharmacy.
example.egtrans: 我不知道去药店的路。

example.eg: Your piece of cake is way bigger than mine.  That's way more than I can spend.
example.egtrans: 你的那份蛋糕比我的大太多了。这笔开销对我来说太大了。

example.eg: Sitting at home doing schoolwork on a Friday night is way depressing.
example.egtrans: 周五的晚上，坐在家里做家庭作业，真是相当令人沮丧。

example.eg: That's way into the future.
example.egtrans: 那是遥远的未来。

dsense.name: a ways
dsense.guideword: US, informal (far in space) (非正式用语)

example.eg: His ways are odd and eccentric.
example.egtrans: 他作风古怪。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 性格, 个性, 作风

example.eg: We went by the old Roman way.
example.egtrans: 我们走的是罗曼公路。

example.eg: Follow the way through the woods.
example.egtrans: 沿着这条道，穿过树林。

example.eg: In some ways I agree with you.
example.egtrans: 在某些方面，我和你观点一致。

example.eg: The way to Boston is a major highway.
example.egtrans: 通往波士顿的路线是一条主高速公路。

example.eg: He is in a bad way today.
example.egtrans: 他今天不在状态。

example.eg: He has a way of always losing his keys.
example.egtrans: 他总爱把钥匙弄丢。

example.eg: The modern way uses brighter colours.
example.egtrans: 现代风格多使用亮色。

example.eg: Chicago is a long way from here.
example.egtrans: 芝加哥离这里很远。

example.eg: It's a long way down from the top of the cliff.
The climber fell a long way down the mountain, but luckily landed in deep snow.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 很长一段路, 慢慢长路

example.eg: A long way off, you could just see the lights from a distant village.
Those birds are swimming a long way off shore, so you'll need a telescope to see them.

dsense.name: a long way off
dsense.guideword: US, colloquial (in the distant future) (口语)

example.eg: My sixtieth birthday is still a long way off.

trans_examp.trans_cn: （时间上）遥远地，在遥远的将来

example.eg: Brad did well on the quiz, but he has a long way to go before he passes the class.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 还有很长的路要走, 漫漫长路

example.eg: He has just run a marathon and was barefoot all the way.
example.egtrans: 他刚跑完马拉松，而且全程都是光脚跑。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 走到底, 整个一路上, 从头到尾

example.eg: "Which football team do you support?" "Manchester United all the way!"
example.egtrans: “你支持哪支足球队？”“当然是曼联队咯！”

example.eg: To get the card to work, you have to put it all the way in.
We had to listen to him snore all the way from New York to Rome.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在…的整个行程中, 自始自终, 一直

example.eg: He sang and danced all the way to school.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 到…的一路上, 整个一路中

example.eg: You want me to carry this all the way back to the house?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不远万里（来到）, 千里迢迢（来到）

example.eg: We're driving to the mountains, but will stop for coffee along the way.
example.egtrans: 我们开车去山区，但沿途将会停车喝下咖啡。

example.eg: Their marriage has lasted 40 years, with a lot of ups and downs along the way.
example.egtrans: 他们已结婚40年了，一直以来经历许多起起伏伏。

dsense.name: any old way, any which way

trans_examp.trans_cn: 以任何方式, 任意地

example.eg: Is there any way you could make your essay more interesting?
I'm not going shopping for you, any which way!

trans_examp.trans_cn: 以任何方式, 在任何方面

example.eg: The wind keeps blowing the smoke any which way.

dsense.name: any which way, any old way

example.eg: She used to load the dishwasher any which way.
example.egtrans: 顺便说一句，你之前见过这个东西么？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 随意地，杂乱地, 顺便说一句

example.eg: She flew from Khartoum to Kathmandu by way of Dubai.
example.egtrans: 她从喀土穆，途经迪拜飞往加德满都。

example.eg: Glen sent Sandy a box of chocolates by way of an apology.
example.egtrans: 格伦送给桑迪一盒巧克力以表歉意。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 小路, 小径, 小径

example.eg: They took out the old walnut grove to clear the way for the bypass.
City council approval cleared the way for the new mall.
That is the worst thing that ever came my way.  I have a feeling that some good luck will come your way soon.
example.egtrans: 那是我所经历的最糟糕的事情。

example.eg: The climber edged his way along the narrow ledge in the cliff face.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 慢慢走, 溜达, 踱步

example.eg: He may or may not have been insured: either way, you can still make a claim.
example.egtrans: 他可能投保了也可能没有，不管怎样，你都可以要求赔偿。

dsense.name: elbow in, elbow your way in
dsense.guideword: figurative, informal (force way in) (比喻用手肘推开人群)

example.eg: A man in the crowd shouted at me for elbowing in.
example.egtrans: 有个男的对我挤进人群非常不满，朝我大喊大叫。

dsense.name: feel strongly one way or the other

example.eg: It was pitch black in the tunnel, so we had to feel our way.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 摸索着走路, 摸索着往前走

example.eg: She felt her way along the corridor in the dark.
example.egtrans: 她在黑暗的走廊中摸索着前进。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 摸索着前进, 尝试着前进

dsense.name: fight your way to the top

example.eg: She fought her way to the top of the company.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 奋力爬上顶端, 登上巅峰

example.eg: I don't know how I'll do it, but I'll find a way.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 想出办法, 找到办法

example.eg: The army forced their way into the city.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 强行挤入, 强行挤进, 挤过去

example.eg: She attempted to keep him outside of the house, but he forced his way in.
I couldn't see much of the parade because a tall fat man got in the way.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 挡路, 妨碍, 阻碍

example.eg: The truck finally got out of the way and I was able to turn right.
Let's get the cleaning out of the way: then we can do something fun.

dsense.name: get your own way, get your way

example.eg: Sue got her own way when her parents let her go to the party.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 走自己的路, 随心所欲

example.eg: Drivers should always give way when there are pedestrians about.
example.egtrans: 当附近有行人时，司机都应该让路。

dsense.name: give way to [sth/sb]
dsense.guideword: (driving: yield to, give priority to) (驾驶中)

example.eg: When driving in the UK, remember to give way to traffic on your right.
example.egtrans: 在英国开车时，请记得给右边的车辆让道。

example.eg: The bridge columns couldn't resist the strong current and ended up giving way.
example.egtrans: 这些桥墩经不住这股强劲的水流，最终倒塌了。

example.eg: Adrian pestered me so much about going to the party that eventually I gave way to him.
example.egtrans: 艾德里安老是缠着我要我去参加那个派对，最后我还是不得不答应他了。

example.eg: With Tom's intelligence and ambition, he'll go a long way.

dsense.name: go a long way, go a long way to do [sth]

example.eg: The man's generous donation will go a long way to help build homes for needy families.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 对…大有帮助，对…很有帮助

dsense.name: go all the way
dsense.guideword: figurative, slang (have sex) (暗指发生性关系)

example.eg: He wanted to go all the way but she said no.
When I began searching for a new house, I didn't expect to find one that went all the way so quickly.
Don't go out of your way to bring me the book: I don't need it today.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 作出额外努力, 特地

example.eg: It is the best bakery in town, and it is worth going out of your way to get your bread there.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 往另一边走, 往另一个方向走

example.eg: Joe set off towards the bank and I went the other way towards the post office.
example.egtrans: 乔朝银行方向走，而我则往相反方向的邮局走。

dsense.name: go way back
dsense.guideword: (have known each other a long time)

example.eg: Chuck and I go way back: we were in high school together.

dsense.name: grease the wheels, grease the way, grease the skids (US), oil the wheels (UK)

example.eg: Richard's friend greased the wheels a little to help him get his job application processed early.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使事情更为顺利进行, 疏通关系

dsense.name: grease the wheels for [sb], grease the way for [sb] (US), oil the wheels for [sb] (UK)

example.eg: She should be a writer - she's really got a way with words.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 善于和…打交道，在…方面很擅长

dsense.name: Have it your way, Have it your own way

example.eg: OK, have it your way; I'm through arguing with you.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 你想怎么着就怎么着吧, 你爱咋咋地吧

dsense.name: have your way with [sb], have your wicked way with [sb]

example.eg: As soon as she saw Paul, Amanda was determined to have her way with him.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 诱惑, 与...发生性关系

dsense.name: in a bad way
dsense.guideword: informal (unwell, in a poor state) (健康状况等)

example.eg: Paul was in a bad way after his motorbike accident.
Luka is behaving in a bad way which is affecting the other children in his class.
If we lose the contract, it will hurt us in a big way.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 非常地，很，大规模地，隆重地

example.eg: There was nothing homoerotic about their greeting, they just hugged each other in a brotherly way.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 兄弟般地, 亲如兄弟地, 亲密友好地

example.eg: I greeted him in a friendly way.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 诚挚地, 亲切地, 友好地

example.eg: What I'm asking, in a roundabout way, is whether you'd like to go out with me tonight?

trans_examp.trans_cn: 迂回曲折地, 拐弯抹角地

example.eg: Being suspended from school has actually improved his behaviour in a small way.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一些, 少许, 小规模地

example.eg: In a way, Aiden deserved the victory as much as his opponent, but there can only be one winner.
example.egtrans: 某种程度上说，艾登也和对手一样应该获得胜利，不过只能有一位赢家。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有点儿…, 某种程度上…
排外地, 权贵独享地

example.eg: One of the customers complained that the waiter had treated him in an offhand way.

trans_examp.trans_cn: （言行）过于随便的, 唐突的
用别的方法, 用另一种方法, 换个方式

example.eg: If I've offended you in any way, I apologise.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 完全, 根本, 绝对

example.eg: I'll get the job done today in any way I can.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无论如何, 不管怎样, 不管以哪种方式

example.eg: The new house was better in every way than the apartment.
Every Greek island is, in its own way, unique.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 自行其是, 以其自己的方式（行事）

example.eg: The fact that you were a little drunk in no way excuses your behavior.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 决不, 一点也不, 没门

example.eg: I thought he looked different in some way, then I realised he'd shaved off his beard.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 以某种方式, 用某种方法

example.eg: I'd like to help him in some way or other because he deserves to succeed.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 以某种方法, 无论以哪种方式, 用种种办法
用那种方法, 以那种方式

example.eg: Sorry if I offended you; I didn't mean it in that way.

dsense.name: in the same way, the same way

example.eg: She never cooks that dish in the same way, so it is different every time.
example.egtrans: 因为她从不以相同的方式来烹饪那道料理，所以那道菜每一次都有不同风味。

dsense.name: in the same way as, the same way as

example.eg: I tried to paint the sunflowers in the same way as Van Gogh.
You've left your car in the way and I can't get past it.
Can you move your suitcase out of the hallway, please? It's in the way.
There isn't much in this book in the way of European history.
If you do it this way it will take longer than if you do it the other way.
example.egtrans: 如果你照这样做会比用其他方式来做更费时间。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 如何, 怎样, 以何种方式

example.eg: Don't copy your classmates: the important thing is to do it in your own way.  You're beautiful in your own way!
He ran down the school hallway knocking people out of his way.
John knows where we are going, so he will lead the way.
Ford led the way into mass-produced automobiles.

dsense.name: learn [sth] the hard way, find [sth] out the hard way, find out [sth] the hard way

trans_examp.trans_cn: 经历艰难才学会, 费一番苦功才了解

example.eg: I'm not sure I would accept a job there; it's a long way from my family.
Don't just look to your right when you cross the street; look the other way as well.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 看向另一边, 朝另一边看
